messages.subject: a pen-pal link
messages.msgSnippet: I returned a post and then I felt bad about it. Here s the main part: We have a penpal database for kids, teens, and moms looking for a penpal. In order to be
messages.messageBody:
I returned a post and then I felt bad about it.

Here's the main part:

We have a penpal database
for kids, teens, and moms looking for a penpal. In order to
be a part of this group you MUST exchange a
postcard/greeting card each month. And you must follow
through once you sign up. We don't want any hurt children
waiting for a card that never arrives!

The address of the site:

To join please go to;
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Homeschoolfamily_Postcardsandmore

-------------------------------

Don't anyone blame this list if your family doesn't have a perfect
experience. There are no perfect experiences. Maybe this group has figured out
brilliant ways to overcome the problems inherent in such exchanges both for families
from heavily populated areas and those from sparse places.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
